comment: DO NOT TAKE AT ALL COSTS!!!! This was the worst professor I have EVER had!!!! He has no idea whats going on in the class, lecturers about whatever he feels like that day, and calls students out. He says he's an A or F kind of guy.. show up and do your work you'll get an A, otherwise you'll get an F. Easy grader, never returns them tho.

He takes FOREVER to grade things. His emails are extremely confusing and he doesn't directly answer your question. Seems like he adds extra words to make himself sound smart, but he just sounds like a fool.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: I took Dr. DeVillar for my Hybrid EDUC 2130 class and he is great! Don't listen to others on here, he is truly the best teacher I have had and wish I could take again. The syllabus tells you exactly what is due on each sunday by 5pm. Not hard at all! Easy A

AVOID!!!! There's not a whole lot of work involved (1 field experience paper (10hrs of observation), 1 chapter presentation (w a partner), & 10 chapter postings online) BUT THE LECTURES ARE AWFUL. Devillar is arrogant, rude, & insulting. His opinion is the only correct opinion. (Insults faith and conservatives). Would never take him again!
He likes to hear himself talk, and is VERY opinionated. Only his opinion is correct. Easy assignments and interesting readings, but lectures are excruciating.

I have to take this for my EDUC degree. If another prof is offered go to them instead. He requires you to buy HIS OWN BOOK for the class. It is supposed to be education but he makes it about himself. His trips, his opinion, his degree, where he went to school. Its an easy grade but don't expect to like it.
Extremely knowledgeable, opinionated but with great insights. If you are a serious student he is a wonderful resource.

TAKE ANOTHER PROF IF YOU CAN. His class is easy, but he is excruciating to listen to. Full of research and statistics but no recent real world experience in the classroom. He means well but he has no idea how to teach undergrad education majors. There are lots of great education professors at KSU, he's just not one of them.
Easy easy easy class. Go to class and complete all of the discussion and dropbox assignments and you will get an A. Boring professor but worth the A!

He actually was not a bad professor. You have to purchase and read his book and write an 300 word essay/150 word discussion post on alternating weeks. You have to work hard and speak up but if you do that then you'll get an A! He's a knowledgeable guy and makes good educational points.
Good prof. Is really intimidating at first, but he starts to warm up throughout the semester. Read the assigned chapters each week and speak up in class and you should get an A.

Terrible teacher. Makes you read a book he wrote. Very smart, but so full of himself. Tells you your opinion doesnt matter and makes you feel very dumb. Assignments weekly from his book. Class is very boring and you learn nothing. Im almost done with this course and have no idea what my grade is. TERRIBLE PROFESSOR. Worst I have taken at KSU.

I would NEVER recommend this professor to ANYONE. my worst enemy deserves better. HE contradicts everything the college of education teaches in all of its other classes and requires you to read the book he wrote. worst professor ever for future teachers.

This man loves to hear himself talk. He always interrupts presentations with his opinions and carries on for at least fifteen minutes. The class is supposed to focus on psychology, but he would rather talk about us book and have you tell him how good it is. Avoid this class at all costs.

The class is very easy. The only thing is that he loves to hear himself speak and interrupt while you're giving a presentation. You have observation hours to do and he's not straightforward on what he wants. He's very opinionated but does accept other opinions differing from his own. very knowlegeable about everything just unclear about class

Loves to hear himself talk and to interrupt people. Dont have an opinion that is different than his because he will argue with you why hes right and our wrong. Easy class but very boring. I dont recommend this professor at all.

He is very researched and knowledgeable in terms of books but he has little to no practical knowledge in the elementary environment.  If you attend his class and listen to him talk you will receive an A.  If you have an opinion keep it to yourself, he does not accept arguements or varying opinions. This class was a lesson in self control & patience

EASY class! Textbook is online (free). 1 chapter presentation a week. Each person presents a chapter with their group to the class. Observation 10 hours and a 5 page paper. Show up and participate and EASY A!

Easy class. 1 chapter presentation to class, 10 hrs. observation & 3 pg. report. Attendance mandatory. Participate in class discussion which is easy. He's not bad, just a bit boring. But such an easy class!

I had him for an education class, and even though he might love to hear hinmself talk and get off topic alot, all you have to do is show up to class and participate, and you WILL get an A.  In my class, we had to write 4 reflections total on the chapters, present a chapter, and a 10 page field experience paper which is very easy  I made EASY A.

Regardless of all the complaints, in the end, this is an easy class. You show up, do the work, engage in discussions,and be a respectful mature person.The class i was in was full of talky girls, who got on his nerves, as well as mine.He teaches graduate lvl and expects that maturity from freshman. He is very knowledgeable if you seek it from him.
Aprolutely horrible professor. Only listened to himself talk, with no interest in student feedback. Was rude and quite honestly extremely arrogant. Avoid at all costs.

Didn't know expectations.  Told does not care to hear your opinion, but asked to write reflections.  Only grade was a 10 pg research paper with 20 citations, plus growth of thinking and attendance.  Have no idea what end grade is!  Never any discussion just listened to him talk for 2hours and 45 minutes.  Nice guy, just not my style teaching.
Does NOT respond to students.  Unhelpful.  Arrogant.  Stay away if you can!!
BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!
Really intelligent teacher, very quiet.  Has that classic, buttoned-down style, which is always hot.

Prof Editing class.  You'll either love talking to this guy about the world (although rarely about editing) or you'll think he's a flake and want to drop out.  His style is interesting and if you are a peole-observer, he is unique.  But if you're in it for the editing, he is not your man.  If you're in it for an easy grade - talk a LOT.
